metadata.title: CVE-2020-35534 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibRaw, there is a memory corruption vulnerability within the"crxFreeSubbandData()" function (libraw\src\decoders\crx.cpp) whenprocessing cr3 files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
libraw23t64 - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.2-2ubuntu2').
darktable package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
